name: Kyong Hoon Kim
content: Real-Time Computing Lab. The RTC (Real-Time Computing) Lab of KNU (Kyungpook National University) aims for creative and innovative research work in real-time computing area. The main resarch topics include real-time systems, real-time networks, security, avionics software, cloud computing, and so on. Recently, we are also works for artifical intelligence. We are very welcome for students and co-workers for the research work. Homepage open A new homepage of RTC Lab is open. We are very welcome for students. ííì´ì§ ìì± ì¤ì ëë¤.
